name: Broken Mind (zerosimms)
description:
Follow Jack in this original sci-fi adventure as he tracks down his abducted daughter and learns the truth

A variety of gameplay, challenges, puzzles and multiple endings await!

Controls:

ActionGameboyKeyboardMoveD PADWASD or Arrow keys
ActionAZExit/BackBXMenuSelectShift

(Please note, this is the initial release, any issues with the game, please let me know)
